meanings.sent1: The uncoalescing clouds remained separate in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The uncoalescing colors in the painting created a disjointed effect.
meanings.sent3: The uncoalescing puzzle pieces refused to fit together, much to the frustration of the child.
meanings.sent4: The uncoalescing opinions in the group led to a lack of consensus on the decision.
meanings.sent5: The uncoalescing ingredients in the recipe resulted in a dish that lacked harmony.

meanings.sent1: The uncoalescing teams struggled to work together effectively.
meanings.sent2: The uncoalescing efforts of the students hindered the success of the project.
meanings.sent3: The uncoalescing flavors in the dish clashed awkwardly, creating an unpleasant taste.
meanings.sent4: The uncoalescing melodies in the song clashed, creating a discordant sound.
meanings.sent5: The uncoalescing groups at the meeting failed to reach a compromise, leading to a stalemate.
